articles.title: ‘Yellowstone’: Taylor Sheridan Says It Was Too Middle America for HBO - IndieWire
articles.description: The Oscar nominee also said he successfully convinced Robert Redford to play John Dutton at HBO — before execs told Sheridan that what they actually wanted was “a Robert Redford type.”…
articles.content:
Taylor Sheridan is calling out HBO for underestimating the appeal of the neo-Western genre.
